items.name: Kano Toon Town Express
items.short_description: Hop aboard the Toon Town Express and meet your favorite cartoon characters! A lively spot for photo ops and high-fives with beloved animated friends.
items.address: Unit 5, Zoo Road Plaza, Sabon Gari, Kano

items.name: Super Squad Hangout
items.short_description: Join the Super Squad for daily hero training and exclusive meet-and-greets with caped crusaders and their sidekicks. Unleash your inner hero!
items.address: Plot 12, Civic Centre Road, Nasarawa, Kano

items.name: Princess Palace Greetings
items.short_description: Meet enchanting princesses from classic tales in their magical palace setting. A dream come true for little royalty with elegant photo opportunities.
items.address: Royal Estate Phase 2, Gidan Rumfa, Kano

items.name: Safari Friends Junction
items.short_description: Explore the jungle-themed junction where friendly safari animals (mascots) are waiting to greet and play with children of all ages.
items.address: Kano Zoo Entrance, Zoo Road, Kano

items.name: Enchanted Forest of Kano
items.short_description: Wander through a whimsical forest filled with iconic fairy tale scenes, interactive installations, and characters brought to life. A truly magical experience.
items.address: Bichi Road, Adjacent to Tiga Dam Reserve, Kano

items.name: Wonderland Gardens
items.short_description: Step into Alice's Wonderland with mazes, giant chessboards, and peculiar characters. Enjoy tea parties and whimsical rides in this imaginative park.
items.address: Gwagwarwa Bypass, Near Kwanar Dawaki, Kano

items.name: Sleeping Beauty's Castle & Grounds
items.short_description: Explore the majestic castle and surrounding grounds, inspired by Sleeping Beauty. Kids can dress up, participate in royal court activities, and enjoy themed play areas.
items.address: Kano-Zaria Road, Adjacent to Kano Golf Club, Kano

items.name: Pinocchio's Workshop Village
items.short_description: A charming village where the story of Pinocchio comes to life. Kids can build wooden toys, meet Geppetto, and enjoy gentle rides in a playful, educational setting.
items.address: Farm Centre, BUK Road, Kano

items.name: Tales of Kano Storyland
items.short_description: A park dedicated to local Kano legends and African folklore. Children can listen to stories under ancient trees, interact with themed play structures, and learn about cultural heritage.
items.address: Gidan Makama Museum Grounds, Emir's Palace Road, Kano

items.name: The Grand Narratives Park
items.short_description: Journey through a park designed with different 'story zones,' each focusing on a classic children's book. Features character meet-and-greets, activity stations, and mini-shows.
items.address: Next to Murtala Muhammed Library, Civic Centre Road, Kano

items.name: Adventure Chronicles Park
items.short_description: An exciting park where children become the heroes of their own adventure. Follow clues, solve riddles, and unlock new parts of the park as a grand story unfolds around them.
items.address: Kano Zoological Garden Annexe, Zoo Road, Kano

items.name: Whispering Woods Tales
items.short_description: A serene park nestled among trees where storytellers captivate audiences with nature-inspired tales and myths. Features cozy reading nooks and a small open-air stage.
items.address: Maiduguri Road, Near Challawa Gorge Dam, Kano

items.name: Kano Kids Discovery Museum
items.short_description: An interactive museum where kids can explore science, art, and culture through hands-on exhibits. Designed to inspire curiosity and learning through play.
items.address: No. 7, Airport Road, Tarauni, Kano

items.name: Little Builders Workshop Museum
items.short_description: Focused on engineering and construction, this museum allows children to design, build, and test their creations using various materials. Ignites problem-solving skills.
items.address: Opposite Federal College of Education, Gyadi-Gyadi, Kano

items.name: Art & Imagination Lab
items.short_description: A vibrant space where young artists can experiment with different art forms, from painting to sculpture. Encourages creativity and self-expression through hands-on art projects.
items.address: Gidan Sarkin Dawaki Mai Tuta, Kofar Kudu, Kano

items.name: Global Explorer's Exhibit
items.short_description: Travel the world without leaving Kano! This museum features miniature versions of global landmarks, cultural artifacts, and interactive exhibits on different countries.
items.address: Buk Road, Opposite Bayero University Old Campus, Kano

items.name: Jungle Gym Kingdom
items.short_description: A massive indoor play center with multi-level jungle gyms, slides, ball pits, and obstacle courses for endless active fun, rain or shine.
items.address: Ado Bayero Mall, Shoprite Wing, Zoo Road, Kano

items.name: Soft Play Safari
items.short_description: Designed for toddlers and young children, this soft play area offers a safe, padded environment for exploration, crawling, and gentle play with sensory elements.
items.address: Grand Central Hotel, Recreation Wing, Bompai, Kano

items.name: Adventure City Playground
items.short_description: A dynamic indoor playground featuring trampolines, climbing walls, a zip line, and an arcade area. Perfect for high-energy kids seeking thrilling activities.
items.address: Azikiwe Road, Beside NNPC Mega Station, Sabon Gari, Kano

items.name: Fun Bounce Haven
items.short_description: An indoor center entirely dedicated to bouncy castles, inflatable slides, and obstacle courses. Kids can jump, slide, and bounce to their heart's content.
items.address: Hotoro North, Hadejia Road, Kano

items.name: Kano Brick City
items.short_description: A vibrant park where children can build anything they imagine with millions of LEGO bricks. Features massive LEGO sculptures and dedicated building zones.
items.address: Zoo Road, Next to Kano Club, Kano

items.name: Mega Block Builders Zone
items.short_description: For younger children, this zone offers oversized building blocks and soft bricks for constructing forts, houses, and imaginative structures in a safe environment.
items.address: Katsina Road, Adjacent to Sabon Gari Market, Kano

items.name: Robo-Build Lab
items.short_description: An advanced construction park where older kids can learn about robotics and engineering by building and programming LEGO Mindstorms robots. STEM-focused fun.
items.address: BUK Road, Opposite Islamic Centre, Kano

items.name: Dream House Design Studio
items.short_description: Kids can unleash their inner architects, designing and building their dream homes, cities, or even spaceships using a wide array of specialized LEGO sets and guidance.
items.address: No. 18, Sani Abacha Way, Kano

items.name: Kano Mini-Olympics Village
items.short_description: A compact sports village offering mini-golf, small football pitches, basketball hoops, and a running track for children to try various sports in a friendly atmosphere.
items.address: Audu Bako Way, Adjacent to Race Course, Kano

items.name: Junior Kicks Arena
items.short_description: Dedicated mini-football pitches and training areas for aspiring young footballers. Offers coaching sessions and casual play for different age groups.
items.address: Tudun Wada Road, Adjacent to Kano Pillars Stadium, Kano

items.name: Slam Dunk Kids Court
items.short_description: Multiple child-sized basketball courts with adjustable hoops. Offers free play, organized games, and beginner lessons for children interested in basketball.
items.address: Gezawa Road, Opposite Bayero University New Site, Kano

items.name: Adventure Obstacle Course
items.short_description: A fun and challenging mini obstacle course designed to improve agility, strength, and coordination. Features climbing nets, balance beams, and soft landings.
items.address: Sani Mai Nagge, Zaria Road, Kano

items.name: Kano Joyland Park
items.short_description: A classic theme park experience with gentle rides, carousels, a mini-roller coaster, and interactive play zones designed specifically for young children and families.
items.address: Zoo Road, Near Kano Zoo, Kano

items.name: Fantasy Bay Kiddie Rides
items.short_description: A smaller, charming theme park focused on fantasy and fairy tale themed rides. Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers, offering a safe and imaginative experience.
items.address: Gidan Bagauda, Tiga Road, Kano

items.name: Adventure Springs Park
items.short_description: An adventure-themed park with water slides, a splash pad, a small train ride, and a petting zoo. Combines thrills with animal encounters for a full day of fun.
items.address: Maiduguri Road, Near Challawa Waterworks, Kano

items.name: Tiny Tot Raceway & Amusements
items.short_description: Featuring mini go-karts, bumper boats, and classic amusement park games adapted for young children. Offers a fun, competitive, and safe environment.
items.address: Dawanau Road, Adjacent to Grain Market, Kano

items.name: The Great Kano Magic Show
items.short_description: Witness amazing illusions and dazzling magic tricks performed live by talented magicians. An interactive show designed to captivate children's imaginations.
items.address: Sani Abacha Indoor Sports Hall, Kofar Mata, Kano

items.name: Wonderland Wizards Academy
items.short_description: Not just a show, but an immersive experience where kids can learn simple magic tricks from 'wizards' and even perform their own illusions on stage.
items.address: Bompai Road, Adjacent to Central Hotel, Kano

items.name: Mystic Miracles Theatre
items.short_description: A family-friendly theatre presenting a variety of magical acts, from comedic magic to grand illusions, ensuring a spellbinding experience for all ages.
items.address: Aminu Kano Teaching Hospital Road, Opposite School of Health, Kano

items.name: The Illusionist's Apprentice
items.short_description: A unique show where a master illusionist involves children directly in creating and revealing magic. An exciting, participatory magical journey.
items.address: Gidan Murtala, BUK Road, Kano

items.name: Kano Star Dome
items.short_description: Explore the wonders of the cosmos in this immersive digital planetarium. Features engaging shows tailored for young astronomers, revealing planets, stars, and galaxies.
items.address: Adjacent to Government House, Emir's Palace Road, Kano

items.name: Little Astronauts Academy
items.short_description: A special planetarium designed for preschoolers, with soft seating and gentle, animated shows about the sun, moon, and friendly aliens. Includes a 'rocket launch' simulation.
items.address: Kano Science and Technology University Campus, Wudil, Kano

items.name: Galaxy Explorers Dome
items.short_description: An advanced planetarium experience with interactive control panels for kids to navigate through constellations, learn about black holes, and pilot virtual spacecraft.
items.address: BUK New Site, Gwarzo Road, Kano

items.name: Cosmic Kids Observatory
items.short_description: Combines a planetarium with a small outdoor observatory for daylight and evening sky gazing (weather permitting). Educational programs focused on celestial events.
items.address: Along Zaria Road, Near Sa'adatu Rimi College of Education, Kano
